references.reason: This paper describes the technical details of GPT-4, a large language model that serves as a foundational technology in the field.

references.paper_title: BERT: Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces BERT, a transformer-based model that has significantly impacted natural language processing and is often used as a starting point for further research.

references.paper_title: Mastering the game of Go with deep neural networks and tree search
references.reason: This paper presents AlphaGo, a program that defeated a professional Go player and demonstrated the power of combining deep learning with tree search techniques.

references.paper_title: Learning Multiple Layers of Features from Tiny Images
references.reason: This paper introduces the CIFAR-10 dataset, a widely used benchmark for image classification tasks.
This paper presents OpenAI Gym, a toolkit for developing and comparing reinforcement learning algorithms, which is highly influential in the field.
